title: PM for another contact with Opposition on electoral reforms: Fawad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 28 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Monday said Prime Minister Imran Khan had directed [the government team] to make another contact with opposition parties on the proposed electoral reforms.
In a tweet, he said Attorney General for Pakistan Khalid Javed Khan would brief [the PM] about the main features of electoral reforms after holding a meeting with the legal team of the opposition parties and Election Commission of Pakistan (ECP).
The minister said the Attorney General would present a report containing the oppositionâ€™s suggestions on electoral reforms to the prime minister.
